actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution to oppose the implementation and enforcement by the President of a program of wage and price controls not specifically authorized by statute.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress opposes the President's promulgation of wage, price, or other economic stabilization standards enforced by a direct or implied threat that compliance with such standards by unions, industries, or other private economic groups will be materially considered in the exercise of administrative discretion by Federal agencies.

titles.title: A resolution to oppose the implementation and enforcement by the President of a program of wage and price controls not specifically authorized by statute.
